document.bingtitle: Qdoba Mexican Grill | Your Mexican Food Restaurant
document.webtitle: Qdoba Mexican Grill | Your Mexican Food Restaurant
document.description: What will you find at your local Qdoba Mexican Grill? Food for people who love food. Try a burrito, taco or 3-cheese queso from the menu, and enjoy!
document.body:
Menu Locations Catering Rewards Q-Cash Order Online It's what summer tastes like. Mango salad is back for a limited time. Some people sing, some make art, we cook. Food for people who love food. It took 47 attempts to get it right, and boy did we get it right. Our 3-Cheese Queso. Just add anything. It's your event, we just make it taste great. Food for people who love food. Nutrition The more you know about our food, the more you’ll love it. Catering Summon your culinary good taste with a phone call. Rewards Be rewarded for what comes naturally.
Menu
prev next
Signature Flavors
We take great pride in putting a unique spin on some of our favorite flavors, which is why you won't find our signature entrees anywhere else. From queso to barbeque to gumbo, we've taken some great flavors and Qdoba-ized them. Customize Yours / Nutrition Grilled Veggie Burrito
Perfectly grilled zucchini, red peppers and yellow squash in a garlic herb seasoning make this one flavorful vegetarian burrito. Customize Yours / Nutrition Queso Burrito
A creamy blend of Monterey Jack, American and Cheddar cheeses with fire-roasted tomatoes, poblano peppers and jalapenos in this savory burrito. Customize Yours / Nutrition Mexican Gumbo
A unique dish that combines tortilla soup, cilantro-lime rice and black or pinto beans with salsa, cheese and corn tortilla strips in a mouth-watering gumbo. Customize Yours / Nutrition Fajita Ranchera Burrito
A vegetarian, slow-simmered sauce of tomatoes, onion, poblano peppers, garlic and spices in a fajita burrito that sizzles with flavor. Customize Yours / Nutrition Ancho Chile BBQ Burrito
Inspired by Mexican molé, the sauce in this BBQ burrito is slightly sweet, with spicy chiles, hickory, smoky mesquite and just a hint of chocolate. Customize Yours / Nutrition
Burritos
Our large Mission-style burritos offer endless combinations of only the freshest, most flavorful ingredients. Have yours made just the way you like it. Customize Yours / Nutrition prev next
Craft 2™
You love your favorite but you want to try something new. We understand. With Craft 2, you can order two perfectly sized portions of our most popular dishes. It’s the best of both worlds. Customize Yours / Nutrition Craft 2™ - Naked Burrito
A perfectly portioned version of our Burrito made with fresh cilantro-lime rice, slow-simmered black or pinto beans, salsa, sour cream and cheese. Customize Yours / Nutrition Craft 2™ - Grilled Quesadilla
A perfectly portioned version of our Grilled Quesadilla, stuffed with perfectly melted Cheddar and Monterey Jack cheeses and served with sour cream and hand-smashed guacamole. Customize Yours / Nutrition Craft 2™ - Tortilla Soup
A perfectly portioned version of our Tortilla Soup, which can be made 100% vegetarian, or with grilled chicken, and then topped with crispy tortilla chips. Customize Yours / Nutrition Craft 2™ - Mexican Gumbo
A perfectly portioned version of our Mexican Gumbo, a unique combination of tortilla soup, cilantro-lime rice and black or pinto beans, with salsa, cheese and corn tortilla strips. Customize Yours / Nutrition Craft 2™ - Nachos
Our Nachos are a perfectly portioned version of our handmade tortilla chips topped with 3-Cheese Queso, black or pinto beans, sour cream and salsa. Customize Yours / Nutrition Craft 2™ - Two Tacos
Choose from two made-to-order soft or crispy tacos. Customize Yours / Nutrition Craft 2™ - Naked Taco Salad
A perfectly portioned version of our Taco Salad made with fresh romaine lettuce, seasoned black bean corn salsa and our tangy fat-free Picante Ranch dressing. Customize Yours / Nutrition
Grilled Quesadillas
Lightly grilled and with the cheese melted to perfection, it’s no surprise they’re so satisfying. Customize Yours / Nutrition 3-Cheese Nachos
If you’re planning on sharing, don’t. Order two. Because you’ll want these 3-Cheese-Queso-smothered-chips all to yourself. Customize Yours / Nutrition prev next
Taco Salads
Dig into crisp lettuce, seasoned black bean corn salsa and a fat free Picante Ranch Dressing. Finish up by eating the bowl. You read right. Eat the bowl. Customize Yours / Nutrition Mango Salad
Our sweet and succulent Mango Salad is finally back, and it's piled high with juicy, handcrafted mango salsa and a splash of zesty cilantro-lime vinaigrette. Available now through August. Customize Yours / Nutrition Taco Salad
Mexican taco salad is a tortilla shell bowl full of fresh romaine lettuce, seasoned black bean corn salsa, our tangy fat-free Picante Ranch dressing and chicken, beef or grilled vegetables. Customize Yours / Nutrition
Tacos
Soft or crunchy? Our tacos always start with the same question. Naturally, you’ll have dozens of ways to customize yours. Customize Yours / Nutrition prev next
Kids Meal
Kids need variety and healthy choices too. That’s why we offer kid-sized versions of our most popular items and nutritious options including all-natural applesauce, 100% vegetarian beans, 100% juice and 1% milk. Customize Yours / Nutrition Kids Meal - Grilled Quesadilla
The Kids Grilled Quesadilla comes with a side of applesauce, beans or tortilla chips and your choice of 100% juice, 1% milk or a small fountain drink. Customize Yours / Nutrition Kids Meal - Taco
The Kids Taco come with a side of applesauce, beans or tortilla chips and your choice of 100% juice, 1% milk or a small fountain drink. Customize Yours / Nutrition Kids Meal - Lil' Naked Burrito
The Kids Lil’ Naked Burrito comes with a side of applesauce, beans or tortilla chips and your choice of 100% juice, 1% milk or a small fountain drink. Customize Yours / Nutrition Kids Meal - Lil' Chicken Nachos
The Kids Lil’ Chicken Nachos comes with a side of applesauce, beans or tortilla chips and your choice of 100% juice, 1% milk or a small fountain drink. Customize Yours / Nutrition
Chips&Dip
Handcut and made in-house daily, our chips make the perfect addition to any meal and yet are flavorful enough to enjoy on their own. Customize Yours / Nutrition Breakfast
Perhaps one of our best-kept secrets. Our Breakfast Burritos aren’t available at all locations, so please contact your neighborhood Qdoba to see if you’re in luck. Customize Yours / Nutrition
